description: With a wind-resistant back of hand material, touchscreen compatibility and Heatseeker™ Eco insulation, the only problem you’ll have with the Apex Insulated Etip™ Gloves is not wanting to take them off. These versatile gloves provide coverage for your fastest or most leisurely hikes.
name: Apex Insulated Etip Gloves - Mens

specs.value: 86% recycled polyester, 14% elastane bonded fabric with non-PFC durable water-repellent (non-PFC DWR) finish
86% recycled polyester, 14% elastane bonded fabric with non-PFC DWR finish
92% recycled polyester, 8% spandex elastane with gripper dot print
100 g Heatseeker™ Eco 70% post-consumer recycled polyester
